class_notes: (ONLINE: synchronous live sessions Tuesdays 2:30-4:30pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via asynchronous online engagement)
course_description: This course allows students to consider what we may "and may not" say regarding God's fidelity, love, and redemptive power in the face of evil, suffering, chaos, and death by examination of traditional and contemporary Christian approaches to these issues.
sections: Class Nbr: 5450, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-4:30p, Instructor: R. Soulen, Status: Open
